snippet.title: Former MicroStrategy executive Sanju Bansal now CEO of Arlington-based Hunch Analytics
snippet.description: The former MicroStrategy is also a co-founder of the new firm along with nation's first CTO Aneesh Chopra

snippet.title: Unmanned future: Drones to clean your gutter, tend to crops and take aerial selfies?
snippet.description: At Nova Labs in Reston, visionary techies work tirelessly with an eye toward delivery, aerial photography

snippet.title: Aneesh Chopra, the nation's first chief technology officer, has started a new venture
snippet.description: Hunch Analytics uses data to help health-care, energy and education executives make smarter decisions.

snippet.title: Google Will Eat Itself: A Q&A with the creators
snippet.description: The project uses money from Google ads to buy Google shares, a commentary on monopolies and the Internet.

snippet.title: Small business advice: How to tell your company's story (tips from SXSW)
snippet.description: Lyn Graft has built a career telling other entrepreneurs' stories, and he shared some of his secrets in Austin.

snippet.title: D.C. community calendar, Feb. 20-27, 2014
snippet.description: Black history programs, health-related events, "Back to Methuselah," "Godspell," Engineering Family Day.

snippet.title: Oregon to get offshore wind energy farm; plastic part forces Aston Martin recall
Commentary: The importance of optimism in the workplace
snippet.description: I don't allow myself to get bogged down in negativity, and neither should you. Just as leaders cannot lead from the rear, they cannot inspire from isolation â€” and pessimism and cynicism are isolating characteristics.

snippet.title: VRE train hits and kills pedestrian on foggy morning
snippet.description: The Target cashier was crossing tracks behind her workplace. VRE spokesman said fence was broken.
